remarks: g-linear property of second (inner product) argument.  Line 19 in [Holland95] p. 14.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapglnm2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapglnm2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapglnm2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapglnm2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmapglnm2.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapglnm2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmapglnm2.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
hdmapglnm2.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapglnm2.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapglnm2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapglnm2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapglnm2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapglnm2.z $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
hdmapglnm2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( A .x. Y ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) .X. ( G ` A ) ) ) $.
